subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: On Nov. 21, 2006, before a modest crowd at Davidson’s John M. Belk Arena, Curry shot 10 of 24 from the field against the Colby Mules, finishing with 29 points.
snippet: On Nov. 21, 2006, before a modest crowd at Davidson’s John M. Belk Arena, Curry shot 10 of 24 from the field against the Colby Mules, finishing with 29 points.
